description:
The current ironic states file, nova/virt/ironic/ironic_states.py, is out-of-date, and was recently updated in ironic with this change:

https://review.openstack.org/118467

Ideally, we should keep these in sync to prevent confusion.
title: Ironic driver states file out-of-date

commit 8fb62fe8274ef4a8b7e2a811d4c55999246cdb5f
Author: David Shrewsbury <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Sep 16 13:59:15 2014 -0400

    Update ironic states and documentation
    
    This adds doc strings for the various states, and updates the documentation
    header to reflect the current state of states.
    
    In addition, this removes the following unused states:
      - INIT
      - BUILDING
      - SUSPEND
    
    Change-Id: I917f1819066520a81cfaac1c9e884a1bf359d59c
    Closes-Bug: #1370184
